scripts.clear: rm -rf 'blog' && rm -rf 'docs' && find i18n -name "*.md" -type f -delete && rm -rf 'i18n/**/*.png' && find i18n -name "*.svg" -type f -delete && find i18n -name "*.jpg" -type f -delete && find i18n -name "*.jpeg" -type f -delete && find i18n -name "*.gif" -type f -delete && find i18n -name "*.png" -type f -delete
scripts.dev: $npm_execpath run ready && $npm_execpath run format && docusaurus start
scripts.ko: $npm_execpath run ready && $npm_execpath run format && docusaurus start --locale ko
scripts.qa:start: $npm_execpath run ready && $npm_execpath run format && $npm_execpath run build && $npm_execpath serve
scripts.readme:
cp tools/README.src.md README.md && printf "

## Last updated 

$(date)
" >> README.md
scripts.ready: $npm_execpath run clear && uv run tools/sanitize.py && uv run tools/process-blog.py && uv run tools/process-docs.py && uv run tools/process-backlinks.py && uv run tools/img-alt-to-figcaption.py
scripts.save: $npm_execpath ready && $npm_execpath run readme && $npm_execpath run scc && $npm_execpath run format && git add . && git commit -m 'wrote something' && git push && pnpm clear
scripts.scc:
printf '
## Stats
' >> README.md && printf '
```
' >> README.md && scc . >> README.md && printf '```
' >> README.md
